metadata.description: Zava Retail Product Catalog - Simplified version without embeddings

products.name: Professional Claw Hammer 16oz
products.description: High-quality steel claw hammer with comfortable fiberglass handle, perfect for framing and general construction work.

products.name: Ball Peen Hammer 12oz
products.description: Classic ball peen hammer for metalworking, riveting, and shaping metal with hardened striking surfaces.

products.name: Finishing Hammer 13oz
products.description: Lightweight finishing hammer with smooth face for trim work and delicate construction tasks.

products.name: Sledge Hammer 3lb
products.description: Heavy-duty sledge hammer for demolition, driving stakes, and breaking concrete with steel handle.

products.name: Phillips Screwdriver Set
products.description: Complete Phillips head screwdriver set with magnetic tips and comfortable cushion grips in multiple sizes.

products.name: Flathead Screwdriver Set
products.description: Professional flathead screwdrivers with precision-machined tips and ergonomic handles for various applications.

products.name: Precision Screwdriver Kit
products.description: Micro precision screwdriver set for electronics, eyeglasses, and small appliance repair work.

products.name: Insulated Screwdriver Set
products.description: Electrician's insulated screwdrivers rated for 1000V with dual-material handles for electrical safety.

products.name: Ratcheting Screwdriver
products.description: Multi-bit ratcheting screwdriver with reversible mechanism and magnetic bit storage in handle.

products.name: Combination Wrench Set SAE
products.description: Standard SAE combination wrenches from 1/4-inch to 1-inch with chrome-vanadium steel construction.

products.name: Metric Wrench Set
products.description: Complete metric combination wrench set from 8mm to 24mm with polished chrome finish.

products.name: Adjustable Wrench 10-inch
products.description: Professional adjustable wrench with parallel jaws and comfortable grip for versatile applications.

products.name: Pipe Wrench Set
products.description: Heavy-duty pipe wrenches for plumbing work with serrated jaws and cast iron construction.

products.name: Torque Wrench 1/2-drive
products.description: Calibrated torque wrench with click mechanism for precise bolt tightening to specifications.

products.name: Needle-Nose Pliers 6-inch
products.description: Long-nose pliers with serrated jaws for gripping small objects and working in tight spaces.

products.name: Lineman's Pliers 9-inch
products.description: Heavy-duty lineman's pliers with cutting edges and insulated grips for electrical work.

products.name: Locking Pliers 10-inch
products.description: Vise-grip locking pliers with adjustable jaw and release lever for secure clamping action.

products.name: Wire Stripping Pliers
products.description: Precision wire strippers with multiple gauge settings and comfortable spring-loaded handles.

products.name: Coping Saw
products.description: Fine-blade coping saw with adjustable frame for intricate curves and detailed woodworking cuts.

products.name: Wood Rasp Set
products.description: Coarse wood rasps for rapid material removal and shaping of wood surfaces.

products.name: Riffler File Set
products.description: Curved riffler files with various profiles for sculptural work and hard-to-reach areas.

products.name: Tape Measure 25-foot
products.description: Heavy-duty tape measure with standout blade and magnetic tip for one-person measuring.

products.name: Speed Square 7-inch
products.description: Aluminum speed square for quick angle cuts and layout work with degree markings.

products.name: Level 24-inch
products.description: Precision aluminum level with three vials for accurate horizontal and vertical alignment.

products.name: Folding Rule 6-foot
products.description: Traditional wooden folding rule with brass hinges for precise inside measurements.

products.name: Digital Caliper 6-inch
products.description: Electronic digital caliper for precise measurements to 0.001-inch accuracy with LCD display.

products.name: Metric Hex Key Set
products.description: Complete metric hex key set from 1.5mm to 10mm in convenient folding case.

products.name: SAE Hex Key Set
products.description: Standard SAE hex key set from 1/16-inch to 3/8-inch with chrome-vanadium steel construction.

products.name: Ball-End Hex Set
products.description: Ball-end hex keys allowing angled access up to 25 degrees for hard-to-reach fasteners.

products.name: T-Handle Hex Set
products.description: T-handle hex keys with comfortable grips for high-torque applications and ease of use.

products.name: Long Arm Hex Set
products.description: Extra-long hex keys for reaching recessed bolts and deep socket applications.

products.name: Cordless Drill 18V Li-Ion
products.description: Professional cordless drill with lithium-ion battery, variable speed control, and LED work light.

products.name: Hammer Drill 1/2-inch
products.description: Corded hammer drill with percussion action for drilling into concrete and masonry materials.

products.name: Right Angle Drill
products.description: Compact right-angle drill for tight spaces with 3/8-inch chuck and reversible motor.

products.name: Impact Drill 20V
products.description: High-torque impact drill with brushless motor for efficient drilling and driving applications.

products.name: Benchtop Drill Press
products.description: Stationary drill press with adjustable table and depth stop for precision drilling operations.

products.name: Circular Saw 7-1/4 inch
products.description: Powerful circular saw with carbide-tipped blade for cutting lumber and sheet materials.

products.name: Cordless Circular Saw 6-1/2
products.description: Battery-powered circular saw with lightweight design and laser guide for portable cutting.

products.name: Worm Drive Saw
products.description: Heavy-duty worm drive saw with superior torque for demanding construction applications.

products.name: Track Saw
products.description: Precision track saw system for perfectly straight cuts in plywood and large panels.

products.name: Mini Circular Saw 4-1/2
products.description: Compact circular saw for detailed work and cutting in confined spaces.

products.name: Orbital Sander 1/4 Sheet
products.description: Variable-speed orbital sander with dust collection system for smooth wood finishing.

products.name: Random Orbit Sander 5-inch
products.description: Random orbital action sander with hook-and-loop pad system for swirl-free finishes.

products.name: Palm Sander
products.description: Compact palm sander with ergonomic design for detail work and tight corners.

products.name: Mouse Sander
products.description: Detail mouse sander with triangular pad for sanding in corners and intricate shapes.

products.name: Drywall Sander
products.description: Long-reach drywall sander with vacuum attachment for dust-free wall preparation.

products.name: Variable Speed Jigsaw
products.description: Precision jigsaw with orbital action and variable speed control for curved and straight cuts.

products.name: Cordless Jigsaw 20V
products.description: Battery-powered jigsaw with tool-free blade change and LED light for portable cutting.

products.name: Barrel Grip Jigsaw
products.description: Compact barrel grip jigsaw for one-handed operation and improved maneuverability.

products.name: Heavy Duty Jigsaw
products.description: Professional-grade jigsaw with powerful motor for cutting thick materials and metal.

products.name: Scrolling Jigsaw
products.description: Precision scrolling jigsaw with rotating barrel for intricate cuts without turning workpiece.

products.name: Angle Grinder 4-1/2 inch
products.description: Compact angle grinder for cutting, grinding, and polishing metal and masonry.

products.name: Large Angle Grinder 7-inch
products.description: Heavy-duty 7-inch angle grinder for aggressive material removal and cutting.

products.name: Cordless Angle Grinder
products.description: Battery-powered angle grinder with brushless motor for extended runtime and power.

products.name: Variable Speed Grinder
products.description: Electronic angle grinder with variable speed control for different materials and applications.

products.name: Cut-Off Tool 3-inch
products.description: Compact cut-off tool for precision cutting in tight spaces and detail work.

products.name: Reciprocating Saw Corded
products.description: Powerful corded reciprocating saw for demolition and rough cutting applications.

products.name: Cordless Recip Saw 18V
products.description: Battery-powered reciprocating saw with tool-free blade change and variable speed.

products.name: Compact Recip Saw
products.description: Lightweight compact reciprocating saw for overhead work and tight access cutting.

products.name: Multi-Tool Oscillating
products.description: Oscillating multi-tool with various attachments for cutting, sanding, and scraping.

products.name: Fixed Base Router 1-3/4 HP
products.description: Precision fixed base router with micro-adjustment and dust collection for edge work.

products.name: Plunge Router 2-1/4 HP
products.description: Variable-speed plunge router with depth adjustment for dadoes and mortises.

products.name: Trim Router 1 HP
products.description: Compact trim router with comfortable grip for edge profiling and laminate trimming.

products.name: Router Table Combo
products.description: Complete router table system with fence and miter gauge for stationary routing.

products.name: Cordless Router 18V
products.description: Battery-powered router with LED light and variable speed for portable woodworking.

products.name: Impact Driver 18V
products.description: High-torque impact driver with hex chuck for driving screws and bolts efficiently.

products.name: Brushless Impact Driver
products.description: Brushless motor impact driver with extended battery life and reduced maintenance.

products.name: Compact Impact Driver
products.description: Lightweight compact impact driver for overhead work and tight spaces.

products.name: Impact Wrench 1/2-inch
products.description: Powerful impact wrench with square drive for automotive and heavy-duty applications.

products.name: Right Angle Impact
products.description: Right-angle impact driver for driving fasteners in confined spaces and corners.

products.name: Belt Sander 3x21 inch
products.description: Professional belt sander for aggressive material removal and surface preparation.

products.name: Variable Speed Belt Sander
products.description: Electronic belt sander with variable speed control for different materials.

products.name: Compact Belt Sander 3x18
products.description: Lightweight belt sander with front handle for improved control and comfort.

products.name: File Belt Sander
products.description: Narrow belt sander for detailed work and sanding in grooves and contours.

products.name: Stationary Belt Sander
products.description: Benchtop belt sander with tilting table for precision edge sanding and sharpening.

products.name: Compound Miter Saw 10-inch
products.description: Precision compound miter saw for accurate crosscuts and miter cuts with laser guide.

products.name: Sliding Miter Saw 12-inch
products.description: Dual-bevel sliding compound miter saw for cutting wide boards and crown molding.

products.name: Cordless Miter Saw 10-inch
products.description: Battery-powered miter saw for portable precision cutting without power cords.

products.name: Basic Miter Saw 10-inch
products.description: Simple miter saw with manual miter adjustment and fence system for basic cuts.

products.name: Miter Saw Stand
products.description: Universal miter saw stand with extensions and folding legs for portable work setup.

products.name: Premium Interior Latex Flat
products.description: High-quality flat interior paint with excellent coverage and hide, perfect for ceilings and low-traffic areas.

products.name: Interior Eggshell Paint
products.description: Durable eggshell finish paint with subtle sheen, ideal for living rooms and bedrooms with easy cleanup.

products.name: Interior Semi-Gloss Paint
products.description: Washable semi-gloss interior paint for kitchens, bathrooms, and trim work with moisture resistance.

products.name: Zero VOC Interior Paint
products.description: Environmentally friendly zero-VOC paint for healthy indoor air quality in all living spaces.

products.name: One-Coat Interior Paint
products.description: High-hide one-coat paint formula that covers most colors in a single application for time savings.

products.name: Exterior Latex Paint Satin
products.description: Weather-resistant exterior paint with satin finish for siding, trim, and outdoor surfaces.

products.name: Exterior Acrylic Paint
products.description: Premium acrylic exterior paint with fade resistance and superior adhesion for long-lasting protection.

products.name: Exterior Primer-Paint Combo
products.description: All-in-one primer and paint system for bare wood and previously painted exterior surfaces.

products.name: Elastomeric Exterior Paint
products.description: Flexible elastomeric paint for stucco and masonry that bridges hairline cracks and prevents water penetration.

products.name: Deck and Fence Stain
products.description: Penetrating wood stain with UV protection for decks, fences, and outdoor wood structures.

products.name: Universal Bonding Primer
products.description: High-adhesion primer for all surfaces including wood, metal, drywall, and previously painted surfaces.

products.name: Stain-Blocking Primer
products.description: Heavy-duty primer that blocks water stains, crayon marks, and other discoloration from bleeding through.

products.name: Metal Primer
products.description: Rust-inhibitive primer specifically formulated for ferrous and non-ferrous metal surfaces.

products.name: Drywall Primer
products.description: Fast-drying primer designed for new drywall with excellent sealing properties and quick recoat time.

products.name: Masonry Primer
products.description: Alkali-resistant primer for concrete, stucco, and other alkaline masonry surfaces.

products.name: Synthetic Brush Set
products.description: Professional synthetic bristle brushes for latex paints with excellent paint pickup and smooth finish.

products.name: Natural Bristle Brush Set
products.description: Traditional natural bristle brushes for oil-based paints and stains with superior flow and leveling.

products.name: Angled Brush Set
products.description: Precision angled brushes for cutting in edges and detail work with comfortable ergonomic handles.

products.name: Foam Brush Set
products.description: Disposable foam brushes for small projects, touch-ups, and applying stains and polyurethane.

products.name: Artist Detail Brush Set
products.description: Fine detail brushes for decorative painting, trim work, and artistic applications with precise control.

products.name: Roller Frame 9-inch
products.description: Heavy-duty roller frame with threaded handle attachment and cage design for various cover types.

products.name: Microfiber Roller Covers
products.description: High-quality microfiber roller covers for smooth finishes with minimal lint and excellent paint capacity.

products.name: Nap Roller Cover Set
products.description: Assorted nap roller covers from 1/4-inch to 1-inch for different surface textures and paint types.

products.name: Mini Roller Kit 4-inch
products.description: Compact roller kit for small areas, touch-ups, and detail work with frame and covers included.

products.name: Extension Pole 4-foot
products.description: Telescoping extension pole for reaching high areas and reducing ladder use during painting projects.

products.name: Aerosol Primer Spray
products.description: Fast-drying spray primer for metal, wood, and plastic with excellent adhesion and coverage.

products.name: Gloss Spray Paint
products.description: High-gloss aerosol paint in various colors for furniture, crafts, and small metal projects.

products.name: Matte Finish Spray Paint
products.description: Flat matte spray paint for decorative items and surfaces requiring a non-reflective finish.

products.name: Rust Prevention Spray
products.description: Rust-inhibitive spray paint for direct application over rust with long-lasting protection.

products.name: Textured Spray Paint
products.description: Specialty textured spray paint creating stone, hammered, or wrinkle finishes on various surfaces.

products.name: Paint Spray Gun
products.description: Professional HVLP paint spray gun for smooth, even coverage on walls, furniture, and automotive surfaces.

products.name: Oil-Based Wood Stain
products.description: Penetrating oil-based stain that enhances wood grain with rich, deep color and natural look.

products.name: Water-Based Wood Stain
products.description: Fast-drying water-based stain with low odor and easy cleanup while maintaining wood beauty.

products.name: Gel Stain
products.description: Thick gel stain that won't drip or run, perfect for vertical surfaces and blotchy woods.

products.name: Semi-Transparent Deck Stain
products.description: Outdoor deck stain with UV protection that allows wood grain to show through natural finish.

products.name: Solid Color Deck Stain
products.description: Opaque deck stain that provides full color coverage while still allowing wood texture to show.

products.name: Clear Polyurethane Satin
products.description: Durable polyurethane finish with satin sheen for wood floors, furniture, and cabinets.

products.name: Gloss Polyurethane
products.description: High-gloss polyurethane for maximum durability and shine on high-traffic wood surfaces.

products.name: Water-Based Polyurethane
products.description: Fast-drying water-based polyurethane with low odor and excellent clarity for interior wood.

products.name: Oil-Based Polyurethane
products.description: Traditional oil-based polyurethane with amber tone and superior durability for classic wood finish.

products.name: Floor Polyurethane
products.description: Commercial-grade floor polyurethane designed for heavy traffic areas with maximum wear resistance.

products.name: Disposable Paint Tray Set
products.description: Lightweight disposable paint trays with liners for easy cleanup and multiple project use.

products.name: Metal Paint Tray 9-inch
products.description: Durable metal paint tray with deep well and ribbed ramp for proper roller loading.

products.name: Paint Tray Liner Set
products.description: Disposable plastic liners that fit standard paint trays for quick cleanup and color changes.

products.name: Rolling Tray with Grid
products.description: Professional rolling tray with built-in grid for removing excess paint and even coverage.

products.name: Paint Bucket Grid
products.description: Wire grid insert for paint buckets to remove excess paint from brushes and rollers.

products.name: Canvas Drop Cloth 9x12
products.description: Heavy-duty canvas drop cloth for floor protection during painting with absorbent cotton material.

products.name: Plastic Drop Cloth
products.description: Lightweight plastic sheeting for furniture and floor protection with easy disposal after use.

products.name: Paper Drop Cloth
products.description: Absorbent paper drop cloth for light protection and easy cleanup on small painting projects.

products.name: Canvas Runner 4x15
products.description: Long canvas runner for hallway and narrow area protection during interior painting projects.

products.name: Pre-Taped Masking Film
products.description: Plastic film with pre-applied masking tape for quick coverage of windows and trim work.

products.name: Wood Screw Assortment
products.description: Comprehensive collection of wood screws in various lengths from 1/2-inch to 3-inch with Phillips and Robertson drives.

products.name: Drywall Screws 1-5/8 inch
products.description: Fine-thread drywall screws with sharp points for quick penetration and secure attachment to metal studs.

products.name: Deck Screws 2-1/2 inch
products.description: Exterior-rated deck screws with corrosion-resistant coating for outdoor construction projects.

products.name: Machine Screws Kit
products.description: Precision machine screws with hex, Phillips, and slotted drives in metric and standard thread pitches.

products.name: Self-Tapping Screws
products.description: Hardened self-tapping screws for metal applications with drilling and threading action in one step.

products.name: Common Nail Assortment
products.description: Traditional common nails from 6d to 16d for general construction and framing applications.

products.name: Finish Nails 2-inch
products.description: Small-head finish nails for trim work and cabinetry where nail heads will be countersunk and filled.

products.name: Roofing Nails 1-1/4 inch
products.description: Galvanized roofing nails with large heads for securing shingles and roofing materials.

products.name: Masonry Nails
products.description: Hardened masonry nails for fastening into concrete, brick, and block with fluted shanks for holding power.

products.name: Brad Nails 18-gauge
products.description: Thin brad nails for delicate trim work and attaching thin materials without splitting.

products.name: Hex Bolt Kit Grade 5
products.description: High-strength Grade 5 hex bolts with matching nuts and washers in popular sizes from 1/4-inch to 1/2-inch.

products.name: Carriage Bolt Set
products.description: Smooth-head carriage bolts with square necks for wood applications and matching hex nuts.

products.name: Eye Bolts Assorted

products.name: Lag Bolts 1/2 x 6-inch
products.description: Heavy-duty lag bolts with hex heads for securing large timbers and structural connections.

products.name: Toggle Bolt Set
products.description: Spring-loaded toggle bolts for hollow wall applications with various lengths and thread sizes.

products.name: Flat Washer Assortment SAE
products.description: Standard flat washers in SAE sizes to distribute load and prevent bolt head pull-through.

products.name: Lock Washer Set
products.description: Split ring lock washers that prevent loosening of bolted connections under vibration.

products.name: Fender Washer Kit
products.description: Large-diameter fender washers for distributing loads over larger areas and soft materials.

products.name: Rubber Washer Set
products.description: Flexible rubber washers for sealing applications and preventing metal-to-metal contact.

products.name: Metric Washer Assortment
products.description: Complete metric flat washer set for European and Asian equipment and machinery.

products.name: Butt Hinge 3-1/2 inch
products.description: Standard door butt hinges with removable pins and screw holes for interior door hanging.

products.name: Piano Hinge 2-foot

products.description: Surface-mount slide bolt latch for doors and gates with smooth sliding action.

products.name: Angle Bracket 4-inch
products.description: Right-angle corner brackets for reinforcing joints and connecting perpendicular members.
